name: @ericblade/quagga2-reader-qr
description: Experimental plugin reader for Quagga2 to read QR codes

scripts.e2e: npm run build:test-app && start-server-and-test run:test-server http-get://localhost:3000 cy:open

build:test-app.win32: npm run build && npm link && cd example && npm install && npm link @ericblade/quagga2-reader-qr && cd .. && npm install

run:test-server.win32: cd example && npx cross-env BROWSER=none npm run start

author: Eric Blade
